EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic Follow Up (1493817450.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Jose, How’s everything going with the Turbonomic trial? Please don’t hesitate to reach out to Steve or I if you have any questions. I know during the call we discussed having another meeting to ensure you and the team get a rundown of the capacity planner’s capabilities. Do you have any time later this week or early next week to hop on a quick call for us to run through that aspect with you and the team? Best, James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[https://turbonomic.com/product/#lower-infrastructure-costs]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com]]>
